articles.title: Brazil woman and psychic con mum out of $140m in art and cash - police
articles.description: An elderly woman's daughter is accused of stealing her artwork by using a psychic to pretend it was cursed.
articles.content:
A woman in Brazil has been arrested on suspicion of using a psychic to swindle her mother out of more than $140m (£114m) in art, cash and jewellery.
